channel.title: Darker Projects: Autumn
channel.description:
Darker Projects in association with Infected Books presents
David Moody's vision of apocalyptic horror
channel.itunes:author: DarkerProjects.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Audio Theater Podcast adaptation of David Moody's novel, Autumn
channel.itunes:summary: Darker Projects in association with Infected Books presents David Moody's vision of apocalyptic horror. Complete dramatized novel in 6 episodes.

item.title: Welcome to Autumn
item.author: webmaster@darkerprojects.com (DarkerProjects.com)
item.description:
Darker Projects
in association with
Infected Books
presents
David Moody's
vision of apocalyptic horror

Listen: Autumn Trailer

Audio production, written, and directed by Paul Mannering.
Post production by Matt Mclaren.
Original music by Devin Anderson http://www.devinanderson.com
Based on the book, Autumn, by David Moody.

Autumn featured the voice talents of:

David Ault as Michael Collins
Rebecca McCarthy as Emma Mitchell
Mark Kalita as Carl Henshawe
Shane Harris as The Narrator
Elie Hirschmann as Philip Evans
Clym Angus as Stuart Jeffries
Steve Anderson as Garner
Colin Snow as Ralph
Fiona Conn as The Teacher
Zack Fester as The Boy
Miles Reid as Jack Bynam
Joan Hovey as Sandra
Laura Post as Jenny and Kate
item.itunes:subtitle: Darker Projects in association with Infected Books presents David Moody's vision of apocalyptic horror Listen: Autumn Trailer Audio production, written, and directed by Paul Mannering. Post production by Matt Mclaren. Original music by Devin Anderson http
